localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title: US covid-19 cases continue to plummet, down 91% from their peak in January and closing in on the lowest levels since the start of the pandemic. 🙏 https://t.co/DJavW12TbW
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 米国のコヴィド19感染者数は激減を続けており、1月のピーク時から91％減少し、パンデミック開始以来の最低水準に近づいています。🙏 https://t.co/DJavW12TbW
美国的covid-19病例继续急剧下降，比1月份的高峰期下降了91%，接近该大流行病开始以来的最低水平。🙏https://t.co/DJavW12TbW
美國的covid-19病例繼續急劇下降，比1月份的高峯期下降了91%，接近該大流行病開始以來的最低水平。🙏https://t.co/DJavW12TbW
